title: [bug] `tauri add` includes the version in generated code

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

[v2] When running `cargo tauri add window-state@2.0.0-beta.2`, the version is included in generated code (`main.rs` and `capabilities/main.json`.


```zsh
$ cargo tauri add window-state@2.0.0-beta.2
    Info Installing Cargo dependency "tauri-plugin-window-state@2.0.0-beta.2"...
    Updating crates.io index
      Adding tauri-plugin-window-state v2.0.0-beta.2 to dependencies.
    Updating crates.io index
    Info Installing NPM dependency "@tauri-apps/plugin-window-state@2.0.0-beta.2"...
yarn add v1.22.19
[1/4] ðŸ”  Resolving packages...
[2/4] ðŸšš  Fetching packages...
[3/4] ðŸ”—  Linking dependencies...
warning " > react-smooth-dnd@0.11.1" has incorrect peer dependency "react@^16.3.0".
[4/4] ðŸ”¨  Building fresh packages...
success Saved lockfile.
success Saved 1 new dependency.
info Direct dependencies
â””â”€ @tauri-apps/plugin-window-state@2.0.0-beta.2
info All dependencies
â””â”€ @tauri-apps/plugin-window-state@2.0.0-beta.2
âœ¨  Done in 5.66s.
    Added permission `window-state@2.0.0-beta.2:default` to `main-capability` at /Users/roniemartinez/Projects/myproject/src-tauri/capabilities/main.json
    Info Adding plugin to /Users/roniemartinez/Projects/myproject/src-tauri/src/main.rs
    Info Running `cargo fmt`...
error: expected one of `!`, `)`, `,`, `.`, `::`, `?`, `{`, or an operator, found `@`
   --> /Users/roniemartinez/Projects/myproject/src-tauri/src/main.rs:297:42
    |
297 |         .plugin(tauri_plugin_window_state@2.0.0_beta.2::init())
    |                                          ^ expected one of 8 possible tokens

```


Here is the diff result

```diff
diff --git a/src-tauri/capabilities/main.json b/src-tauri/capabilities/main.json
index 2f8b2b3..cd3c587 100644
--- a/src-tauri/capabilities/main.json
+++ b/src-tauri/capabilities/main.json
@@ -14,6 +14,7 @@
         "shell:allow-open",
         "notification:default",
         "updater:default",
-        "process:allow-restart"
+        "process:allow-restart",
+        "window-state@2.0.0-beta.2:default"
     ]
-}
+}
\ No newline at end of file
diff --git a/src-tauri/src/main.rs b/src-tauri/src/main.rs
index 9f42822..53360b2 100644
--- a/src-tauri/src/main.rs
+++ b/src-tauri/src/main.rs
 
 fn main() {
     tauri::Builder::default()
+        .plugin(tauri_plugin_window_state@2.0.0_beta.2::init())
         .plugin(tauri_plugin_shell::init())
         .plugin(tauri_plugin_deep_link::init())
         .plugin(tauri_plugin_dialog::init())
```

### Reproduction

Run `cargo tauri add window-state@2.0.0-beta.2`

### Expected behavior

Version is not included in generated code

### Full `tauri info` output

```text
[âœ”] Environment
    - OS: Mac OS 14.4.0 X64
    âœ” Xcode Command Line Tools: installed
    âœ” rustc: 1.77.1 (7cf61ebde 2024-03-27)
    âœ” cargo: 1.77.1 (e52e36006 2024-03-26)
    âœ” rustup: 1.27.0 (bbb9276d2 2024-03-08)
    âœ” Rust toolchain: stable-x86_64-apple-darwin (environment override by RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN)
    - node: 20.2.0
    - yarn: 1.22.19
    - npm: 9.6.6

[-] Packages
    - tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.13
    - tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.10
    - wry [RUST]: 0.37.0
    - tao [RUST]: 0.26.2
    - tauri-cli [RUST]: 2.0.0-beta.11
    - @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.6
    - @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 2.0.0-beta.11

[-] App
    - build-type: bundle
    - CSP: unset
    - frontendDist: ../dist
    - devUrl: http://localhost:1420/
    - framework: React
    - bundler: Vite
```
```


### Stack trace

### Additional context
